vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "RBep20Delegator::_setImplementation: Caller must be admin");
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.value == 0,"RBep20Delegator:fallback: cannot send value to fallback");
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "RBep20Delegator::_setImplementation: Caller must be admin");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.value == 0,"RBep20Delegator:fallback: cannot send value to fallback");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
RBep20Delegator.delegateTo (RBep20Delegator.sol#905-913) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	(success,returnData) = callee.delegatecall(data) (RBep20Delegator.sol#906)

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
RBep20Delegator.fallback (RBep20Delegator.sol#946-960) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	(success) = implementation.delegatecall(msg.data) (RBep20Delegator.sol#950)

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: RBep20Delegator.delegateToViewImplementation (RBep20Delegator.sol#932-940) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (RBep20Delegator.sol#117-179) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (RBep20Delegator.sol#143)
	-transferFrom (RBep20Delegator.sol#157)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RBep20Delegator._setImplementation (RBep20Delegator.sol#545-558):
	External calls:
	- delegateToImplementation(abi.encodeWithSignature(_resignImplementation())) (RBep20Delegator.sol#549)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- implementation (RBep20Delegator.sol#553)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in RBep20Delegator.constructor (RBep20Delegator.sol#509-537):
	External calls:
	- delegateTo(implementation_,abi.encodeWithSignature(initialize(address,address,address,uint256,string,string,uint8),underlying_,cointroller_,interestRateModel_,initialExchangeRateMantissa_,name_,symbol_,decimals_)) (RBep20Delegator.sol#523-530)
	- _setImplementation(implementation_,false,becomeImplementationData) (RBep20Delegator.sol#533)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- admin (RBep20Delegator.sol#536)
